content:
In the south, our defenders destroyed two Russian drones - SuperCam and Lancet.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

"As of 5:30 pm on March 21, 2024, air purposes were destroyed - SuperCam UAV and Lancet UAV," the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Armed Forces in the SouthDestroyedFlame grenade launcher and the ENB station of the occupiers.
title: In the south of the Armed Forces "landed" Russian drones SuperCam and "Lancet"
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. “As of 17:30 on March 21, 2024 ...
author: Army Inform
